Dragonmark of the Sentinel bonus: You gain the effects of the Deific Warding feat. This does not stack with the feat itself.
This item is one of two pieces of the Dragonmark Heir set. When both items are equipped you will gain two additional uses of Greater Dragonmark after resting.

Dragontouched: This mythical material was created by combining an unknown metal with ancient enchantments known only by the dragons. This material is said to enchant the wielder as if they were protected by +5 armor enchantment. Additionally it provides leather items with additional flexibility and metal armors additional protection.

Dragonshard Focus - Sentinel:This effect bestows additional benefits to those that bear the Dragonmark of Sentinel. Least: Exotic Weapon Proficiency: Bastard Sword. Lesser: Parrying I Greater: Insightful Fortification +25%

Dream Vision %v1: Passive: %v1 %b1 bonus to Attack and Damage rolls. Your melee and ranged attacks are also able to bypass the miss chance for attacking Incorporeal enemies as if they had Ghost Touch.
Dripping with Magma: This Obsidian weapon drips with magma on every swing. Your attacks have a high chance to deal very strong fire damage over time.
Druidic Stoneshape: While in Wild Shape, you receive a Primal bonus to PRR equal to half the number of Wilderness Lore feats you have.
Druidic Survival Mastery: While in Wild Shape, you receive a Primal bonus to damage equal to half the number of Wilderness Lore feats you have.
Dusk: Equipping this item engulfs you in twilight shadows. Attacks from enemies have a 10% chance to miss you due to concealment.

Earthgrab: This weapon stores the implacable strength of the earth deep within. When this weapon is used, this power occasionally comes to the surface, calling on the earth to erupt from the ground and hold an enemy in place.

Earthgrab Guard: This item stores the implacable strength of the earth deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, calling on the earth to erupt from the ground and hold an enemy in place.
Take a trip into the past!

Earth Savant: This item in one of two pieces of the Earth Savant set. When both items are equipped, Acid spells gain a +5% chance to critical hit. Acid spell critical damage is increased by 0.5 to the spell critical multiplier.
Earthen Guard: When you are successfully attacked, there is a chance that a Stone Skin will be cast on you.

Echoes of Angdrelve 4: Eager to taste the flesh of your enemies, this wicked sword drips burning acid at your command. Each strike from this devastating weapon deals an additional 4d6 Acid damage on each hit.

Echoes of Angdrelve 6: Eager to taste the flesh of your enemies, this wicked sword drips burning acid at your command. Each strike from this devastating weapon deals an additional 6d6 Acid damage on each hit.
Efficient Metamagic - Embolden II: The additional spell point cost for using the Embolden Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP.
Efficient Metamagic - Empower I: The additional spell point cost for using the Empower Metamagic feat is reduced by 1 SP.
Efficient Metamagic - Empower II: The additional spell point cost for using the Empower Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP.
Efficient Metamagic - Empower Healing I: The additional spell point cost for using the Empower Healing Metamagic feat is reduced by 1 SP.
Efficient Metamagic - Empower Healing II: The additional spell point cost for using the Empower Healing Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP.
Efficient Metamagic - Enlarge I: The additional spell point cost for using the Enlarge Metamagic feat is reduced by 1 SP.
Efficient Metamagic - Enlarge II: The additional spell point cost for using the Enlarge Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP.
Efficient Metamagic - Extend I: The additional spell point cost for using the Extend Metamagic feat is reduced by 1 SP.
Efficient Metamagic - Extend II: The additional spell point cost for using the Extend Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP.
Efficient Metamagic - Intensify II: The additional spell point cost for using the Intensify Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP.
Efficient Metamagic - Maximize I: The additional spell point cost for using the Maximize Metamagic feat is reduced by 1 SP.
Efficient Metamagic - Maximize II: The additional spell point cost for using the Maximize Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP.
Eidolon Summons: On Being Damaged: Animates a portion of the wearer's shadow to support them in battle. The shadow remains animate for 30 seconds and can be created once every 120 seconds.

Elasticity: This bow is strung with special fibers that cause it to occasionally launch arrows with shocking force. When rolling a 19 or 20 on a ranged attack, your critical multiplier is increased by +1.

Elemental Bane: A bane weapon excels at attacking one type or subtype of creature. Against Elementals, this weapon's effective enhancement bonus is +2 better than its normal enhancement bonus. It deals an extra 2 to 12 points of damage against the foe.
Eldritch II: On Hit: 2 to 8 Force Damage.
Eldritch III: On Hit: 3 to 12 Force Damage.
Eldritch IV: On Hit: 4 to 16 Force Damage.
Eldritch VI: On Hit: 6 to 24 Force Damage.
Electrifying: This weapon is sheathed in sparking electricity. An electrifying weapon deals an extra 3 to 18 points of electricity damage on a successful hit.
Electrifying 1: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to arc with electricity, dealing 1d6 Lightning damage on each hit.
Electrifying 2: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to arc with electricity, dealing 2d6 Lightning damage on each hit.
Electrifying 3: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to arc with electricity, dealing 3d6 Lightning damage on each hit.
Electrifying 4: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to arc with electricity, dealing 4d6 Lightning damage on each hit.
Electrifying 5: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to arc with electricity, dealing 5d6 Lightning damage on each hit.
Electrifying 6: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to arc with electricity, dealing 6d6 Lightning damage on each hit.
Electrifying 7: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to arc with electricity, dealing 7d6 Lightning damage on each hit.

Electric Vulnerability: On Hit: Applies a stack of Vulnerable (1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.). This effect may only occur on-hit once every second.
Elemental Manipulation: This item provides a +90 Equipment bonus to your Acid, Cold, Electric, and Fire Spell Power.

%b1 Elemental Absorption %v1%: Passive: %v1% Enhancement Bonus to Acid, Cold, Fire, and Electrical Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
%b1 Elemental Resistance %v1: Passive: %v1 %b1 bonus to your Acid, Cold, Electricity, Fire, and Sonic Resistances.
%b1 Elemental Resonance %v1: Passive: %v1 %b1 bonus to Acid, Fire, Electric and Cold Spell Power.

Elemental Spell Power: Harnessing a small amount of the power and potential of the raw elements, this item gives you a +50 bonus to your maximum spell points. This stacks with all other bonuses except Elemental Spell Power.
Elemental Spiral: Elemental power pulses within you. 'Can you feel the Heartbeat? Can you hear the Music? Can you comprehend the Magic? It is there, right at your fingertips.'

Elf Bane: A bane weapon excels at attacking one type or subtype of creature. Against Elves, this weapon's effective enhancement bonus is +2 better than its normal enhancement bonus. It deals an extra 2 to 12 points of damage against the foe.
Embodiment of Law: Chaotic aligned characters equipping this item suffer a temporary negative level until the item is removed.

Embrace of the Spider Queen: While Lolth protects her faithful from the venom of her spiders, non-evil beings who bear items sacred to her may feel her displeasure, suffering a -6 penalty to Fortitude saving throws versus Poison.
Enchantable: Adventuring Bonus: This hat can be enchanted to bestow one of various benefits useful in general adventuring. Adventuring effects may change the minimum level of this item.
Enchantable: Crystal Rush: This hat can be enchanted to bestow one of various benefits to nearby kobolds in Crystal Cove.

Enchantable: Skilled Seaman: This hat can be enchanted to grant a bonus to one skill. You can have one skill bonus on a hat at a time, but can replace it with a different choice. Skill effects may change the minimum level of this item.
Enchanting Death %v1: Increases your caster level when casting Enchantment and Necromancy spells by %v1.
%b1 Enchantment Save %v1: %v1 %b1 bonus to your saves versus enchantments
%i1 Energy Absorption %v1%: This effect absorbs %v1% of all %i1 damage the character would have taken, after all other protections have been penetrated.
%b1 %i1 Resistance %v1: Passive: %v1 %b1 bonus to your %i1 Resistance.
Energy Siphon IV: On Hit: Gain 20 Temporary Spellpoints which last for up to 1 minute. This effect can trigger at most once per minute.
Energy Siphon V: On Hit: Gain 25 Temporary Spellpoints which last for up to 1 minute. This effect can trigger at most once per minute.
Energy Siphon XII: On Hit: Gain 30 Temporary Spellpoints which last for up to 1 minute. This effect can trigger at most once per minute.
Energy Siphon X: On Hit: Gain 50 Temporary Spellpoints which last for up to 1 minute. This effect can trigger at most once per minute.
Energy Siphon XI: On Hit: Gain 55 Temporary Spellpoints which last for up to 1 minute. This effect can trigger at most once per minute.
Energy Siphon XII: On Hit: Gain 60 Temporary Spellpoints which last for up to 1 minute. This effect can trigger at most once per minute.

Enervation: This weapon stores a menacing, ravenous power deep within. When this weapon is used, this power occasionally comes to the surface, draining the life force of the enemy and giving negative levels.
Enfeebling: Critical hits by this weapon deal an extra 1 to 6 points of Strength damage.

Enhanced Bloodrage: This weapon is enhanced by blood - your blood! Each time you take damage or kill an enemy, there is a small chance that you will fall into an unholy bloodrage, greatly increasing your Melee Power, Constitution, and Damage. However, this rage will leave you more vulnerable to Physical attacks, slightly reducing your Armor Class.

Stance.Name: Enhanced Bloodrage
Stance.Description:
THIRST FOR BLOOD You spell blood... Blood! BLOOD BLOOD BLOOD! GIVE ME BLOOD!
+10 Melee Power +8 Constitution +5 Damage -4 Armor Class

Buff.DisplayText: Enhanced Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 15% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
Enhanced Ki %v1: Increases the rate at which the user gains Ki with each successful attack.

Entangling Yarn: Enemies struck by this weapon have a small chance to be tangled up in its enchanted yarn, becoming Entangled and preventing all movement for 9 seconds. A DC 35 Reflex Save negates this effect.
Entropic: An entropic weapon crackles with a sinister energy that seeks to unmake anything it contacts. When it strikes a target, they take an extra 2 to 12 points of untyped damage.
Entropic 2: This weapon is intensely powerful, and crackles with destructive, unpredictable magic. It deals an additional 2d6 untyped damage on each hit.
Entropic 3: This weapon is intensely powerful, and crackles with destructive, unpredictable magic. It deals an additional 3d6 untyped damage on each hit.
Entropic 4: This weapon is intensely powerful, and crackles with destructive, unpredictable magic. It deals an additional 4d6 untyped damage on each hit.
Entropic 6: This weapon is intensely powerful, and crackles with destructive, unpredictable magic. It deals an additional 6d6 untyped damage on each hit.
Entropic 7: This weapon is intensely powerful, and crackles with destructive, unpredictable magic. It deals an additional 7d6 untyped damage on each hit.

Epic Giant Bane: A bane weapon excels at attacking one type or subtype of creature. Against Giants, this weapon's effective enhancement bonus is +8 better than its normal enhancement bonus. It deals an extra 6 to 36 points of damage against the foe.

Epic Freezing Ice: On items: While you are wearing this item, your melee, ranged, and unarmed attacks gain the Freezing Ice ability. (When the weapon is used, an icy power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice.) - (duration: 9 seconds)
Epic Goldcurse: This weapon applies a dangerous, golden curse to enemies struck! They must succeed on a DC25 Fortitude save on each Critical hit or be Paralyzed by solid gold.

Epic Nimbleness: This suit of armor looks much less restrictive than others of its type. A suit of armor that has this property has a maximum Dexterity bonus 6 higher than normal, and its armor check penalty is reduced by 4.
Epic Noxious Venom Spike: On Damage: Do an additional 2 to 12 Poison damage.
Epic Paragon Evil Guard: When hit or missed in combat, the attacking creature takes 8d8 Evil damage.
Epic Paragon Good Guard: When hit or missed in combat, the attacking creature takes 8d8 Good damage.
Epic Paragon Light Guard: When hit or missed in combat, the attacking creature takes 8d8 Light damage.
Epic Paragon Negative Guard: When hit or missed in combat, the attacking creature takes 8d8 Negative damage.

Epic Telekinetic: Targets that suffer a critical hit from a Telekinetic weapon must make a DC 35 Strength or Dexterity check or be knocked down. The target will then be forced to make DC 16 Balance checks to recover from this effect.
Epic Transmuted Platinum Guard: This glorious item shines with a warm magic, and has a chance of freezing your attackers in a cage of Transmuted Platinum.

Epic Trap the Soul: This equipment stores an overwhelming, merciless power deep within. When you strike an enemy with a melee or missile attack, this power occasionally comes to the surface, sucking out the life force of an enemy and imprisoning the essence of their body and soul in a gem.
Equipped Healing Amplification %v1: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by %v1 (Equipment bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.

Eternal Holy Burst: While you are wearing this item, your melee, ranged, and unarmed attacks gain the Holy Burst ability. (This weapon is holy. The weapon deals an additional 1 to 6 good damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 good damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.)

Eternal Faith: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Eternal Faith increase the owner's effective level for the turning check by +2, his maximum Hit Dice turned by +2, and his total Hit Dice turned by +4.

Eternal Fire: While you are wearing this item, your melee, ranged, and unarmed attacks gain the Flaming Burst ability. (This weapon is sheathed in fire. The weapon deals an additional 1 to 6 fire damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 fire damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 critical multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.)
Ethereal: Equipping this item causes your hands and weapons to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets.

Everbright: Flecks of marble and pearl shimmer across this shield, set within images of bursting stars and beaming suns. An everbright shield will never take damage from rust or acid and can emit a Blinding Flash 3/rest.
Eversight: You benefit from the spell True Seeing and are Immune to Blindness.

Evil Blast 4: This weapon is a sinister implement of evil deeds, dealing 4d6 Evil damage on a successful hit, and an additional 4d6 Evil damage on a critical hit. This effect makes the weapon evil aligned. Good characters wielding this weapon will suffer one negative level.

Evil Blast 6: This weapon is a sinister implement of evil deeds, dealing 6d6 Evil damage on a successful hit, and an additional 6d6 Evil damage on a critical hit. This effect makes the weapon evil aligned. Good characters wielding this weapon will suffer one negative level.
Evil characters wielding this weapon will suffer one negative level.
Evil Outsider Bane: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt monsters that bring ill intent from other planes, dealing an additional 1d10 bane damage vs. Evil Outsiders.
Evil Outsider Bane 2: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt monsters that bring ill intent from other planes, dealing an additional 2d10 bane damage vs. Evil Outsiders.
Evil Outsider Bane 3: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt monsters that bring ill intent from other planes, dealing an additional 3d10 bane damage vs. Evil Outsiders.
Evil Outsider Bane 4: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt monsters that bring ill intent from other planes, dealing an additional 4d10 bane damage vs. Evil Outsiders.
Evil Outsider Bane 5: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt monsters that bring ill intent from other planes, dealing an additional 5d10 bane damage vs. Evil Outsiders.
Evil Outsider Bane 6: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt monsters that bring ill intent from other planes, dealing an additional 6d10 bane damage vs. Evil Outsiders.
Exceptional Alluring Skills Bonus %v1: %v1 Exceptional bonus to Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle, Intimidate, and Perform.
Exceptional Nimble Skills Bonus %v1: %v1 Exceptional bonus to Balance, Hide, Move Silently, Open Lock and Tumble.
Exceptional Prudent Skills Bonus %v1: %v1 Exceptional bonus to Heal, Listen and Spot.
Exorcist of the Silver Flame: This item in one of two pieces of the Exorcist of the Silver Flame set. When both items are equipped you gain three additional Turn Undead attempts after resting.
Extra damage vs Giants: This weapon deals an additional 2 to 16 damage against Giants.
Extra damage vs non-Giants: This weapon deals an additional 1 to 8 damage against non-Giants.
Extra damage vs Undead: This weapon deals an additional 1 to 10+4 light damage against the Undead.
Extra Lay on Hands %v1: You have %v1 Lay on Hands charges.
Extra Smite: You have one additional Smite Evil use per rest. You must rest to gain your initial charge.
Extra Smites %v1: %v1 Smite Evil uses per rest. Smite Evil uses regenerate 15% faster.

Faeryfire Curse: Empowered by the Fearylights, your Illusion spells have a chance to curse your enemies with Purple Faery Fire, dispelling stealth, invisibility, blur, and displacement for 30 seconds, and giving a -40 penalty to hide. Sightless enemies are immune to the dazzle effect.
Faith: Holy power infuses this item, providing damage reduction 5/evil.
%b1 False Life %v1: %v1 %b1 bonus to hit points.

Buff.Type: Favor of the Lord of Blades
Buff.DisplayText: Favor of the Lord of Blades: As you hold this spear in your hands, a steely voice echoes in your mind... My faithful child of the Creation Forge, you may wield this spear as if it were your own. With this weapon, I grant you my blessing. (This item counts as a Favored weapon.)

Requirement.Item: Follower of the Lord of Blades

Buff.DisplayText: Favored Weapon: This weapon has a divine attunement and gains bonuses as if it were a Favored Weapon regardless of your Deity.
Fearsome: This item causes those who strike the user to be overcome with terror, as from the Fear spell.
Feat: Pierce Adamantine: While equipped this item grants the feat Pierce Adamantine.
Pierce Cold Iron: While equipped this item grants the feat Pierce Cold Iron.
Feat: Pierce Silver: While equipped this item grants the feat Pierce Silver.
Shield Proficiency: Tower Shield: While equipped this item grants the feat Shield Proficiency: Tower Shields.

Feather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the descent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.
Feat - Bow Strength: While equipped this item grants the feat Bow Strength, allowing you to apply your Strength bonus to ranged attacks made with bows.
Feat - Elusive Target: Passive: You gain the feat Elusive Target.
Feat - First Blood: While equipped this item grants the feat First Blood.

Feat - Mobility: While equipped this armor grants the wielder the Mobility feat: increases the maximum dexterity bonus permitted by armor and tower shields by 2, adds a +4 bonus to Armor Class while tumbling, and gain a 2% dodge bonus.
Feat - Precise Shot: While equipped this item grants the feat Precise Shot, allowing your ranged attacks to pass through other characters and monsters to strike your target.
Feat - Weapon Focus - Thrown: While equipped this item grants the feat Weapon Focus: Thrown.
Feat - Elusive Target: While equipped, this item grants the feat Elusive Target.
Feat - Wind through the Trees: While equipped, this item grants the feat Wind through the Trees.
Feat: Quick Draw: While equipped, this item grants the feat Quick Draw.
Feeding 10: On Vorpal Hit: Your target incurs one Negative Level, and you gain +10 Temporary Hit Points. (These Temporary Hit Points last for one minute, or until used to negate incoming damage.)
Feeding 20: On Vorpal Hit: Your target incurs one Negative Level, and you gain +20 Temporary Hit Points. (These Temporary Hit Points last for one minute, or until used to negate incoming damage.)
Feeding 30: On Vorpal Hit: Your target incurs one Negative Level, and you gain +30 Temporary Hit Points. (These Temporary Hit Points last for one minute, or until used to negate incoming damage.)
Felling the Oak: On a natural 20 that is confirmed as a critical hit, this weapon will trip your opponent, forcing them to fall prone. There is no save against this effect.
Fetters of Unreality: This weapon is cruel and deadly, and leaves behind wounds that affect both the body and the soul. This weapon has a chance to inflict multiple stacks of Vulnerable.
Feybane 2: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt those born of the Feywild, dealing an additional 2d10 bane damage vs. Fey.
Feybane 6: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt those born of the Feywild, dealing an additional 6d10 bane damage vs. Fey.

Fiery Detonation: This weapon is imbued with a fiery wrath. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this burning power will be released, dealing damage to the target and all enemies near it for 15d6 fire damage.A successful Fortitude save (DC 39) reduces this by half.
Fiery: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to burn with enchanted flames, dealing 1d6 Fire damage on each hit.
Fiery 2: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to burn with enchanted flames, dealing 2d6 Fire damage on each hit.
Fiery 3: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to burn with enchanted flames, dealing 3d6 Fire damage on each hit.
Fiery 4: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to burn with enchanted flames, dealing 4d6 Fire damage on each hit.
Fiery 5: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to burn with enchanted flames, dealing 5d6 Fire damage on each hit.
Fiery 6: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to burn with enchanted flames, dealing 6d6 Fire damage on each hit.

Finesse %v1: This weapon has a small Air Elemental bound to it. The wielder can use a finesse weapon as if they had the Weapon Finesse feat. In addition, the weapon grants a %v1 enhancement bonus to the wielder's Dexterity score.
Fire Guard I: When Hit in Melee: Deals 1 to 4 Fire damage to your attacker.
Fire Guard II: When Hit in Melee: Deals 2 to 8 Fire damage to your attacker.
Fire Guard II: When Hit in Melee: Deals 8 to 32 Fire damage to your attacker.
Fire Guard X: When Hit in Melee: Deals 10 to 40 Fire damage to your attacker.
%b1 Fire Lore %v1%: Passive: Your Fire spells gain a %v1% %b1 bonus to their chance to critical hit.

Fire Savant: This item in one of two pieces of the Fire Savant set. When both items are equipped, Fire spells gain a +5% chance to critical hit. Fire spell critical damage is increased by 0.5 to the spell critical multiplier.

Fire Shield (Cold): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Cold) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Hot) from another item source, they will nullify each-other.

Fire Shield (Cold) Miss-Guard: When you are missed, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Cold) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Hot) from another source, they will nullify each other.

Fire Shield (Hot): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Hot) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Cold) from another item source, they will nullify each-other.
Firestorm Lore %v1%: Passive: Your Fire and Lightning spells gain a %v1%% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
Fire Touch: This weapon gives off a faint aura of warmth. A fire touch weapon deals an additional +1 Fire damage on a successful hit.

Fire Vulnerability: On Hit: Applies a stack of Vulnerable (1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.). This effect may only occur on-hit once every second.

Flamebitten: On Hit: Applies a stack of Vulnerable (1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.). This effect may only occur on-hit once every two seconds. On Vorpal: Applies a stack of Ashscarred (-1 to all Saving Throws. Non-bosses also move and attack 5% slower. This effect stacks up to 5 times.)
Flameblade: This blade is made of pure fire and is surprisingly light to the touch. It bypasses the Incorporeal chances of Ethereal monsters innately.
Flamescale: Adds Adamantine material type. On hit: 15d6 Fire Damage.
Flaming I: On Hit: 1 to 4 Fire Damage.
Flaming II: On Hit: 2 to 8 Fire Damage.
Flaming III: On Hit: 3 to 12 Fire Damage.
Flaming IV: On Hit: 4 to 16 Fire Damage.
Flaming V: On Hit: 5 to 20 Fire Damage.
Flaming VI: On Hit: 6 to 24 Fire Damage.
Flaming 9: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to burn with enchanted flames, dealing 9d6 Fire damage on each critical hit.
Flaming 10: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to burn with enchanted flames, dealing 10d6 Fire damage on each critical hit.
Flaming X: On Hit: 10 to 40 Fire Damage.
Flaming: This weapon is sheathed in fire. A flaming weapon deals an extra 1 to 6 points of fire damage on a successful hit.
Flaming 14: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to burn with enchanted flames, dealing 14d6 Fire damage on each critical hit.
Flaming 15: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to burn with enchanted flames, dealing 15d6 Fire damage on each critical hit.

Flaming Blast: A flaming blast weapon is sheathed in fire. Critical hits with this weapon deal an additional 1 to 10 fire damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 critical multiplier, and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier. Additionally, if you roll a 20 when attacking and confirm the critical hit, the weapon blasts your target, doing 4 to 24 more fire damage.
Flaming Blast II: This weapon burns with deadly magical fire. The weapon deals an extra 2d6 Fire damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 2d6 Fire damage.
Flaming Blast III: This weapon burns with deadly magical fire. The weapon deals an extra 3d6 Fire damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 3d6 Fire damage.
Flaming Blast IV: This weapon burns with deadly magical fire. The weapon deals an extra 4d6 Fire damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 4d6 Fire damage.
Flaming Blast V: This weapon burns with deadly magical fire. The weapon deals an extra 5d6 Fire damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 5d6 Fire damage.
Flaming Blast VI: This weapon burns with deadly magical fire. The weapon deals an extra 6d6 Fire damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 6d6 Fire damage.
Flaming Blast 7: This weapon burns with deadly magical fire, dealing 7d6 Fire damage on a successful hit, and an additional 7d6 Fire damage on a critical hit.

Flaming Burst: This weapon is sheathed in fire, and deals 1 to 6 fire damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 fire damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.
Flametouched Iron: Flametouched Iron grants +1 saves versus Evil Outsiders.
Fleshmaker: Magical insight into the ways of the flesh allow the wearer of this item to receive more effect from healing spells cast on them. +20 Enhancement bonus to Positive Healing Amplification.
Force: This weapon is humming with magical force. It deals an additional 1 to 6 force damage on a successful hit.
Force Blast 2: This weapon ripples with intense force, dealing 2d6 Force damage on a successful hit, and an additional 2d6 Force damage on a critical hit.
Force Blast 3: This weapon ripples with intense force, dealing 3d6 Force damage on a successful hit, and an additional 3d6 Force damage on a critical hit.
Force Blast 4: This weapon ripples with intense force, dealing 4d6 Force damage on a successful hit, and an additional 4d6 Force damage on a critical hit.
Force Blast 6: This weapon ripples with intense force, dealing 6d6 Force damage on a successful hit, and an additional 6d6 Force damage on a critical hit.
Force Blast 7: This weapon ripples with intense force, dealing 7d6 Force damage on a successful hit, and an additional 7d6 Force damage on a critical hit.

Force Burst: This weapon is humming with magical force, and does 1 to 6 force damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 force damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.
Forged Lightning: On Hit: 2% Chance to do 300 to 500 damage in a blast radius.
%b1 Fortification %v1%: %v1 %b1 bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
%b1 Fortitude Save %v1: This item gives a %v1 %b1 bonus to your Fortitude save.
Fracturing: This weapon is ideal for breaking bones and deals 2 to 12 damage to targets that have skeletons or are made of bone.
Fracturing 2: This weapon is ideal for breaking bones and does 2d8 damage to targets that have skeletons or are made of bone.
Fracturing 3: This weapon is ideal for breaking bones and does 3d8 damage to targets that have skeletons or are made of bone.
Fracturing 4: This weapon is ideal for breaking bones and does 4d8 damage to targets that have skeletons or are made of bone.
Fracturing 6: This weapon is ideal for breaking bones and does 6d8 damage to targets that have skeletons or are made of bone.
Fragmented: This item looks as though it is only one half of a greater item. Perhaps in the future it could be rejoined with its other half to reform the item in its original glory.
Freedom of Movement: This item grants its wearer the ability to move and attack normally while under the influence of magic that impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow and web.
Freezing 4: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to become frozen to the touch, dealing 4 to 24 Ice damage on each critical hit.
Freezing 6: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to become frozen to the touch, dealing 6 to 36 Ice damage on each critical hit.
Freezing 7: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to become frozen to the touch, dealing 7 to 42 Ice damage on each critical hit.
Freezing 8: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to become frozen to the touch, dealing 8 to 48 Ice damage on each critical hit.
Freezing 9: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to become frozen to the touch, dealing 9 to 54 Ice damage on each critical hit.
Freezing 10: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to become frozen to the touch, dealing 10 to 60 Ice damage on each critical hit.
Freezing 12: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to become frozen to the touch, dealing 12 to 72 Ice damage on each critical hit.
Freezing 13: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to become frozen to the touch, dealing 13 to 78 Ice damage on each critical hit.
Freezing 15: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to become frozen to the touch, dealing 15 to 90 Ice damage on each critical hit.

Freezing Ice: On items: While you are wearing this item, your melee, ranged, and unarmed attacks gain the Freezing Ice ability. (When the weapon is used, an icy power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice.) - (duration: 9 seconds)

Freezing Ice Guard: This item stores the pitiless immovable power of the ice deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice.

Frenzied Berserker: This item in one of two pieces of the Frenzied Berserker set. Humanoid Bane 6: This weapon is attuned specifically to those that walk among us, dealing an additional 6d10 bane damage vs. Humanoids.

Hunter of the Dead: This item in one of two pieces of the Hunter of the Dead set. When both items are equipped you will gain three additional uses of Remove Disease per rest after resting. If you have the Hunter of the Dead 3 Enhancement, this item will give your weapons additional damage versus Undead.
Ice Barrier: When struck in combat, there is a small chance you will be shielded by conjured ice, preventing the next 15 Damage unless that damage is Fire. This lasts for 1 minute or until depleted.

Icy Blast 4: This weapon is sheathed in icy cold, dealing 4d6 Cold damage on a successful hit, and an additional 4d6 Cold damage on a critical hit.
Icy Blast 6: This weapon is sheathed in icy cold, dealing 6d6 Cold damage on a successful hit, and an additional 6d6 Cold damage on a critical hit.
Icy Blast 7: This weapon is sheathed in icy cold, dealing 7d6 Cold damage on a successful hit, and an additional 7d6 Cold damage on a critical hit.
Icy Blast 8: This weapon is sheathed in icy cold, dealing 8d6 Cold damage on a successful hit, and an additional 8d6 Cold damage on a critical hit.

Icy Burst: This weapon is sheathed in icy cold, and deals 1 to 6 cold damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 cold damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.

Illusory Death 3: Increases your caster level when casting Illusion and Necromancy spells by 3.
Immunity to Fear: The wearer of this item is immune to all fear effects.

Improved Acid Resistance: This property absorbs the first 20 points of Acid damage per attack that the wearer would normally take.
Improved Auto-Repair: This item has a small percentage chance to cast a Repair Serious Damage spell on you when you take damage.
Improved Bashing: This shield does an additional 2 to 12 damage when used to shield bash.
Improved Bashing X: On Shield Bash: +5d4 Bludgeoning damage. On Melee Hit: +20% Chance to automatically hit your enemy with a Shield Bash attack.

Improved Banishing: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Outsiders. On Vorpal Hit: If an outsider struck by this weapon has fewer than 1500 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the outsider has above 1500 Hit Points, it takes 150 damage.
Improved Cold Augmentation IX: Increases the wearer's caster level when casting ninth level or lower Cold spells by three.
Improved Cold Resistance: This property absorbs the first 20 points of cold damage per attack that the wearer would normally take.

Improved Cursespewing: On Vorpal Hit: Your enemy is cursed with a -4 Morale penalty on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks. This painful curse also causes the victim to take 2d6 damage every two seconds for a duration of twelve seconds. Additional vorpal strikes while the curse is active will extend the duration by another twelve seconds.

%b1 Improved Deception %v1: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a %v1 %b1 bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.

Improved Destruction: On Hit: Your target gains a stack of Armor Destruction. (-1 penalty to Armor Class, -1% of its Fortification. 20 Second Duration. Stacks up to 15 times.) This effect may trigger once every second.
Improved Demonic Shield: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a shield of demonic energy will grant you a +120 Profane bonus to temporary hit points.

Improved Destruction: On Hit: Your target gains a stack of Armor Destruction. (-1 penalty to Armor Class, -1% of its Fortification. 20 Second Duration. Stacks up to 15 times.) This effect may trigger once every second.

Improved Disease Guard: This item carries a virulent disease that may be contracted by enemies that hit you, dealing 2 to 8 Constitution damage. A successful Fortitude save (DC 24) will negate this effect.

Improved Disruption: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Undead. On Vorpal Hit: If an undead struck by this weapon has fewer than 1500 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the undead has above 1500 Hit Points, it takes 150 damage.
Improved Earthen Guard: When you are successfully attacked, there is a 15% chance that a Stone Skin will be cast on you.
Improved False Life: This item grants the wearer +20 maximum health.
Improved Fire Augmentation IX: Increases the wearer's caster level when casting ninth level or lower Fire spells by three.
Improved Fire Resistance: This property absorbs the first 20 points of fire damage per attack that the wearer would normally take.
Improved Metamagic: Heighten: Your Heighten Metamagic costs 1 less Spell Point to use per spellcast.
Improved Heroism: Passive: +3 Morale bonus to all your attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.
Improved Insightful False Life: Passive %v1 Insight bonus to Hit Points.
Improved Lightning Resistance: This property absorbs the first 20 points of Electric damage per attack that the wearer would normally take.

Improved Paralyzing: Any creature struck by this weapon must succeed on a DC 28 Will save or be paralyzed. The target may attempt a new save to end the effect every several seconds; otherwise the paralysis lasts for 1 minute.
Improved Regeneration: This item is imbued with an undeniable goodness that flows outward like a gentle breeze, slowly healing the wearer over time.
Improved Roaring: This weapon causes targets to become shaken (DC 28 Will save negates) and, on a critical hit, does 2 to 12 sonic damage to the target.

Improved Shattermantle: Translucent, writhing energy and blue sparks can be seen raging within this weapon. When a shattermantle weapon strikes a foe that has spell resistance, the value of that spell resistance is reduced by 6 for 9 seconds. A foe can only have its SR reduced by one Shattermantle effect at a time.

Improved Smiting: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Constructs. On Vorpal Hit: If a construct struck by this weapon has fewer than 1500 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the construct has above 1500 Hit Points, it takes 150 damage.
Vorpal: Passive: +0.5[W] damage dice. On a Vorpal Strike: If your target has fewer than 1500 hit points, it is instantly slain. If your target has above 1500 hit points, it takes 150 damage.

Improved Quelling Strikes: On Vorpal Melee: applies a Quell effect to target enemy for six seconds, rendering them unable to cast divine spells. This has a 50% chance of preventing the target from casting all spells for three seconds (12 second cooldown).

Improved Slowburst: This weapon has an image of a snail worked into its hilt or grip, and it feels cold to the touch. Whenever you score a critical hit with this weapon, the target is slowed for 30 seconds. A DC 28 Will save negates this effect.
%b1 Impulse %v1: %v1 %b1 bonus to Force/Untyped spell power.
Impact: Passive: The base critical threat range of this weapon is doubled. This does not stack with Improved Critical feat. Vorpal Strikes by this weapon also bypass all Fortification.
Incandescence: This weapon glows with the light of Irian. This weapon deals an extra 1 to 6 points of Light damage on a successful hit.
Incineration: This weapon stores the power of a raging inferno deep within. Occasionally, this destructive power comes to the surface, devastating enemies with massive fire damage.

Incineration Guard: This item stores the power of a raging inferno deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this destructive power occasionally comes to the surface, devastating enemies with massive fire damage.
%b1 Incite %v1%: %v1% %b1 bonus to increased threat generation from melee damage

Insightful Faith: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Insightful Faith items provide Insight Bonuses to the owner's effective level for the turning check by +2, their maximum Hit Dice turned by +2, and their total Hit Dice turned by +4.
Insightful Nimble Skills Bonus %v1: %v1 Insightful bonus to Balance, Hide, Move Silently, Open Lock and Tumble.

Inspiring Echoes: When a bard wields this item, Anthem abilities that restore Bard songs over time restore them 40% faster (for example, an ability that restores a Song every 5 minutes would restore one song per 3 minutes instead).
Inspiration of the Inferno: While this Fiddle is equipped, you will use it to perform your Bardic Music.
Intelligence Skills - Exceptional Bonus +4: Passive +4 Exceptional bonus to the Intelligence based skills of: Disable Device, Repair, Search, and Spellcraft

Inflict Blight: This weapon is infested with the unholy and blighted power of the earth. Rarely, this power will come to the surface, attempting to melt enemies struck with Acid, Negative, Poison, or Evil spells by dealing significant Acid damage over time.

Intercession Ward: Protects the user's connection to a source of Divine power and wards that connection from such things as a Quell's intercession ability. This effect only protects from incoming attacks and will not restore a lost connection.
Invisibility: This item bends light around the wearer, allowing them to cast invisibility as per the spell on themselves. Just equipping the item will give the wearer a +2 Deflection bonus to AC.

Invisibility Guard: This item has a chance of granting you temporary invisibility when you are hit by foes. The invisibility will not be removed when you attack or take damage, but it will wear off after 10 seconds.
Invulnerability: Reduces physical damage by 5, except from attacks from magic weapons. DR 5/magic.
Irian's Fury: This holy weapon is attuned to protective, radiant light. If Quarterstaves are your favored weapon, while you are projecting an Aura of Menace, you can absorb 10 spells per rest.

Irian's Might: This holy weapon can unleash incredible power. If Quarterstaves are your favored weapon, whenever you Turn Undead, you become Favored by Irian, increasing your Fire and Light Spell Critical Damage by 5% (Quality Bonus) for 20 seconds.
Jolting 9: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to arc with electricity, dealing 9d6 Lightning damage on each critical hit.

Keen: The base critical threat range of this weapon is doubled. This does not stack with Improved Critical feat. Vorpal Strikes by this weapon also bypass all Fortification.

Kensei: This item in one of two pieces of the Kensei set. When both items are equipped you gain a +2 Exceptional to hit with melee attacks, and +3 to confirm criticals. If you have the fifth Core Enhancement in the Kensei tree, this item will grant a +3 Exceptional bonus to hit. This bonus will stack with all existing bonuses.
Kick 'Em While They're Down: You have 5 more attack and deal 5 more damage to enemies that are knocked down or stunned.
%b1 Kinetic Lore %v1%: Passive: Your Force, Physical and Untyped spells gain a %v1% %b1 bonus to their chance to critical hit.
Knee Cracker: On Hit: 15% chance to slow 25% (No Save) for 5 seconds (non-bosses only).

Knight of the Chalice: This item in one of two pieces of the Knight of the Chalice set. When both items are equipped you will receive gain spell resistance 22. If you have the Fiendslayer 3 Enhancement, this item will give your weapons additional damage versus Evil Outsiders.
Kos-zik, The Air-Change: +20 Insight Bonus to Jump and Tumble, +5 Insight Bonus to Sneak Attack dice and damage
Kos-zik, The Air-Change: +10 Insight Bonus to Jump.

Large Scorpion Poison: On a critical hit, this weapon injects the target with Large Scorpion poison, causing 1 to 4 Constitution loss with an additional 1 to 4 Constitution loss after 1 minute if a DC 14 Fortitude save is failed.

Lawful Outsider Bane: A bane weapon excels at attacking one type or subtype of creature. Against Lawful Outsiders, this weapon's effective enhancement bonus is +2 better than its normal enhancement bonus. It deals an extra 2 to 12 points of damage against the foe.
Legendary Acid Torrent: On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this power will be released, dealing damage to the target and all enemies near it for 30d6 + 90 acid damage.
Legendary Affirmation : Your attacks and offensive spells have a chance to grant you 1,000 Temporary HP.

Legendary Air Guard: This weapon stores the incredible, dynamic power of the air deep within. When the user of this weapon is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, knocking enemies over or speeding up the wearer with rushing winds.

Legendary Avalanche: This magical item contains the destructive power of an avalanche within, and when you are damaged below 50% HP, its power is unleashed in the form of a massive explosion of Cold damage.

Legendary Blinding Embers: This weapon sheds tiny embers that can impair a creatures sight. If you roll a 20 when attacking and confirm the critical hit, the target will become blinded by a burst of fiery sparks.
Legendary Brilliance Guard: This item is imbued with a brilliant, radiant power. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, the attacker has a chance of becoming blinded.

Legendary Cacophonic Guard: This item stores the resonant power of pure sound within in. When the wearer is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, dealing an overwhelming amount of Sonic damage to the attacker.
Legendary Cerulean Wave: This powerful magical implement hums in your hands and resonates with icy magic. Spells you cast have a chance of freezing your targets in a block of solid ice. DC: 70
Legendary Chimera's Ferocity: This item grants extra bonuses if the wearer has been bestowed with Dragonmarks. Any dragonmark grants Proficiency: Bastard Sword; further bonuses are detailed below.
Legendary Conditioning %v1%: You have a %v1% %b1 bonus to Maximum Hit Points.

Legendary Cursespewing: On Vorpal Hit: Your enemy is cursed with a -4 Morale penalty on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks. This painful curse also causes the victim to take 6d6+6 damage every two seconds for a duration of twelve seconds. Additional vorpal strikes while the curse is active will extend the duration by another twelve seconds.

Legendary Disease Guard: This item carries the Maggot Plague disease, which deals 3d6 Constitution damage and may be contracted by enemies that hit you. A successful Fortitude Save (DC 100) will negate this effect.

Legendary Electric Storm: On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this power will be released, dealing damage to the target and all enemies near it for 30d6 + 90 electric damage.

Legendary Elemental Energy: Harnessing a small amount of power and potential of the raw elements, this item gives you a +150 bonus to your maximum spell points. This stacks with all bonuses except for Legendary Elemental Energy.

Legendary Entangling Yarn: Enemies struck by this weapon have a small chance to be tangled up in its enchanted yarn, becoming Entangled and preventing all movement for 9 seconds. A DC 110 Reflex Save negates this effect.

On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this freezing power will be released, dealing damage to the target and all enemies near it for 30d6 + 90 cold damage. A successful Will save (DC 100) reduces this by half.
Legendary Freezing Ice: On hit, this has a chance of freezing your enemies in solid ice. Struck enemies must make a DC 100 Fortitude save or be frozen solid.
Legendary Goldcurse: This weapon applies a dangerous, golden curse to enemies struck! They must succeed on a DC100 Fortitude save on each Critical hit or be Paralyzed by solid gold.

Legendary Ice Barrier: When struck in combat, there is a small chance you will be shielded by conjured ice, preventing the next 150 Damage unless that damage is Fire. This lasts for 1 minute or until depleted.

Legendary Lightningstorm Guard: This item stores the incredible, dynamic power of the air deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, striking the attacker with an incredible amount of electrical force.

Legendary Magma Surge: This item stores the immeasurable heat of the planet's molten mantle. When this weapon is used, superheated magma occasionally flows to the surface, slowing an enemy down and inflicting massive fire damage over time.

Legendary Magma Surge Guard: This item stores the immeasurable heat of the planet's molten mantle. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, superheated magma occasionally surges to the surface, causing a tremendous amount of Fire damage to the attacker.
Legendary Mineral: This weapon bypasses Adamantine, Byeshk, Cold Iron, Mithral, and Adamantine DR. This weapon is considerably strengthened, gaining +150 Maximum Durability.
Legendary Negation: Attacks and offensive spells have a chance to inflict 1d3 Negative Levels. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

Legendary Nightmare Guard: On being hit or missed, this item has a chance to attempt to fear your enemy, ripping the life from them as if they were struck with a Phantasmal Killer spell. Enemies must make a DC 100 Will save versus the Fear or a DC 100 Fortitude save versus Death or be slain. Even if they make their save versus Death, they may still be feared.
Legendary Paralysis: On hit, this has a chance of paralyzing your enemies. Struck enemies must make a DC 100 Fortitude save or be paralyzed.
Legendary Radiance: Attacks and offensive spells have a chance to blind enemies with Light damage.
Legendary Sirocco: On hit, this has a chance of blinding your enemies with whirling sand. Struck enemies must make a DC 100 Fortitude save or be blinded.
Legendary Slay Living: On hit, this has a chance of snuffing the life from your foes, slaying them instantly. Struck enemies must make a DC 100 Fortitude save or be slain.

Legendary Slicing Winds: This weapon whistles with the wind. On hit, this mysterious power has a chance of coming to the surface, slicing at the struck enemy for a significant amount of Slashing damage.

Legendary Slowburst: This weapon has an image of a snail worked into its hilt or grip, and it feels cold to the touch. Whenever you score a critical hit with this weapon, the target is slowed for 30 seconds. A DC 100 Will save negates this effect.

Legendary Stealer of Souls: Blackrazor hungers for the Souls of those you have defeated. On a Vorpal hit with this weapon, Blackrazor will absorb some of its Soul, draining one level from the target. When you strike the killing blow on an enemy, Blackrazor retains one Defeated Soul, up to a maximum of 20. Each Defeated Soul grants you +1 Profane bonus to Melee Power and +1 Profane bonus to Damage. If you block or unequip Blackrazor, the Defeated Souls will be released. Defeated Souls last for 30 seconds.
Legendary Steam : Your attacks and offensive spells have a chance to deal Untyped damage.

Legendary Stone Guard: This item is invested with the power of the earth. On being struck in melee, it has the chance to attempt to turn the target to stone, as the Flesh to Stone spell. A successful Fortitude save (DC 100) negates the effect.

Legendary Stone Prison: This weapon is invested with the power of the earth. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit it will attempt to turn the target to stone, as the Flesh to Stone spell. A successful Fortitude save (DC 100) negates this effect.
Legendary Tet-zik, The Enlightened Change: Whispers of the ancients grant you the ancient martial secrets of the Thri-Kreen. Your elemental Monk stances grant additional bonuses.

Legendary Trap the Soul: This equipment stores an overwhelming, merciless power deep within. When you strike an enemy with a melee or missile attack, this power occasionally comes to the surface, sucking out the life force of an enemy and imprisoning the essence of their body and soul in a gem.
Legendary Telekinetic: On hit, this has a chance of knocking your enemies off their feet. Struck enemies must make a DC 100 Reflex save or be knocked down.

When you roll a 20 on an attack, the enemy must make a DC 28 Fortitude save or be subjected to a -6 penalty to all stats. At the same time you will feel your power return, as though Greater Restoration were cast on you. (Greater Restoration cures all temporary ability damage, restores all negative levels suffered from energy drain, and eliminates fatigue, exhaustion, confusion, and insanity suffered by you.)

On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit, this power comes to the surface, granting 25 temporary hit points to the wielder and dealing 25 to 45 damage to the target. Light Bringer: On Vorpal Hit: If an undead struck by this weapon has fewer than 1000 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the undead has above 1000 hit points, it takes 100 damage.
Light Guard: This armor blasts those that attack the wearer, causing 1d6 light damage on a successful melee attack.
Light of Dawn: Chance on being hit or missed in combat to deal 10 to 60 points of light damage to attacker.
Lightning Bolt Ward: Protects against lightning bolt spells.
Lightning Guard VII: When Hit in Melee: Deals 7 to 28 Electric damage to your attacker.
Lightning Lash: This item lashes electricity through your opponents. Your attacks and offensive spells have a high change to deal very strong Electric damage over time.
%b1 Lightning Lore %v1%: Passive: Your Electric spells gain a %v1% %b1 bonus to their chance to critical hit.

Lightning Storm Guard: This item stores the power of a volatile thunderstorm deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this dynamic power occasionally comes to the surface, devastating enemies with a massive lightning strike.
Lightning Strike: This weapon stores the power of a volatile thunderstorm deep within. Occasionally, this dynamic power comes to the surface, devastating enemies with a massive lightning strike.

Lightning Strike Weapons: While wearing this item, your melee and ranged weapons gain Hit Effect: This weapon stores the Power of a volatile thunderstorm deep within. Occasionally, this dynamic Power comes to the surface, devastating enemies with a massive lightning strike.
Lights Out: This lantern does not light the way. On hit, this has a chance of blinding your enemies with ash.

Limb Chopper: This potent and feared ability allows the weapon to sever the limbs of those it strikes. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit, the weapon severs an opponent's limb from its body. Some creatures, including many aberrations and all oozes, have no limbs. Others, such as golems and undead creatures, are not affected by the loss of their limbs. Most other creatures, however, have their movement slowed 75% and attacks slowed by 50% when a limb is cut off.
Lingering Acidic Burn: This weapon splashes acid on your opponents. Your attacks have a high chance to deal very strong Acid damage over time.
Linguistics %v1%: This item reduced the cooldowns of your Social skills (Diplomacy, Bluff, Intimidate) by %v1%. This does not stack with the Negotiator ability.
Linguistics 10%: This item reduced the cooldowns of your Social skills (Diplomacy, Bluff, Intimidate) by 10%. This does not stack with the Negotiator ability.
Linguistics 15%: This item reduced the cooldowns of your Social skills (Diplomacy, Bluff, Intimidate) by 15%. This does not stack with the Negotiator ability.

Magi: This item grants the wearer +100 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.

Magical Null: The nullcloth that this robe is made from absorbs spell energies making it difficult for all spell casters, even Divine casters, to complete their spells. +15% Spell Failure chance.

Magma Surge: This weapon stores the immeasurable heat of the planet's molten mantle. When this weapon is used, superheated magma occasionally surges to the surface, slowing an enemy down and inflicting massive fire damage over time.

Magma Surge Guard: This item stores the immeasurable heart of the planet's molten mantle. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, superheated magma occasionally surges to the surface, slowing an enemy down and inflicting massive fire damage over time.

Maiming: This weapon has a twisted haft or grip and spikes along its blade, head, or point. Whenever you score a critical hit with this weapon it deals an amount of extra untyped damage depending on its critical multiplier: x2 - 1 to 6, x3 - 2 to 12, x4 - 3 to 18.
Maiming 2: This weapon has a twisted haft or grip and spikes along its blade, head, or point. When you score a critical hit with this weapon, it does an additional +2d8 damage.
Maiming 3: This weapon has a twisted haft or grip and spikes along its blade, head, or point. When you score a critical hit with this weapon, it does an additional +3d8 damage.

Maiming 8: This weapon has a twisted haft or grip and spikes along its blade, head, or point. When you score a critical hit with this weapon, it does an additional +8d8 damage.

Major Lesser Dragonmark Enhancement: This will increase the total number of Lesser Dragonmarks you can use by 5. However, these additional Lesser Dragonmarks will only take effect after the wielder rests.
Maker's Touch: Casting a Repair spell on yourself or allies leaves a lingering defensive buff that increases the AC and Physical Resistance Rating of your target by +3 for 12 seconds.
Maladroit: This weapon afflicts enemies with sluggish and clumsy movements. -1 Dexterity on a successful hit.

Malleable: This item has a magical aura of malleability and can be combined with any item that has the Fusible property to create a new, more powerful fusion of the two items. (DDOBuilder Note: The Malleable versions of these items are separate items)

Manslayer: While wearing this item, your weapon attacks gain the devastating ability to defeat a humanoid opponent with a single decisive blow. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit a humanoid target will be killed. Powerful humanoids may resist the vorpal strike and instead take 100 points of damage until they have been sufficiently weakened.
Chimera's Fangs - Mark of Healing (Heal Amplification): House Jorasco's Mark of Healing grants a +38 Competence Bonus to Healing Amplification.
Chimera's Fangs - Mark of Making (Repair Amplification): House Cannith's Mark of Making grants a +38 Competence Bonus to Repair Amplification.

Chimera's Fangs - Mark of Storm (Electric Absorption): House Lyrandar's Mark of Storm grants a +38% (actually 28%) enhancement bonus to Electricity absorption. You are immune to the Knockdowns of Air Elementals.
Chimera's Fangs - Mark of Warding (Spell Resistance): House Kundarak's Mark of Warding grants a +38 (actually 28) Enhancement Bonus to Spell Resistance.
Chimera's Fangs - Mark of Sentinel (Hate Magnet): House Deneith's Mark of Sentinel grants a +10 Enhancement bonus, Incite +20% and Insightful Fortification +50%
Marksmanship: This item is enchanted to enhance your skill with ranged weapons. When using ranged weapons you gain +2 to your attack rolls and +1 to your damage.
Mastery over Earth Elementals: This weapon grants the user dominion over all Earth Elementals that feel its touch.
Masterwork: This armor is more finely crafted than normal, reducing the Armor Check Penalty by 1.
Masterwork: This weapon is more finely crafted than normal, providing a +1 Enhancement bonus on attack rolls.

%b1 Melee Alacrity %v1%: Gain %v1% %b1 bonus to Melee attack speed. Does not stack with the Haste spell.

Medusa Fury: When you fall below 25% of your maximum hit points you will enter a constant Medusa Fury until your hit points return to 25% or greater. Medusa Fury grants a +4 Morale bonus to Strength and Constitution, a 5% Morale bonus to your chance to doublestrike, and a -25% penalty to fortifications.
%b1 Melee Power %v1: This item provides a %v1 %b1 bonus to Melee Power.
Melodic Guard: When being hit there is a chance for the opponent to dance.
Melody Bulwark: Your Inspire Greatness grants you and your allies an additional +3 PRR.

Melody: Imperial Resonance: This powerful item is attuned to your ability to perform musical magic. If you have 15 or more bonus effective Bard levels from Feats, additional Bard songs, or enhancements, it provides 30 Exceptional Sonic Spell Power and 15% Exceptional Sonic Spell Lore.
Meltscale: Adds Crystal and Byeshk material type. On hit: 15d6 Acid Damage.
Memory of Chains Broken: Your hits have a 5% chance to Paralyze enemies for 5 seconds.
Metal Fatigue: The metal plates of this armor sometimes tire you out. When you are damaged there is a small chance that you will become Exhausted.
Metalline: Metalline bypasses any metal based damage reduction. (Adamantine, "Alchemical, Silver", Byeshk, Cold Iron, Mithral)
%b1 Mighty Skills Bonus %v1: %v1 %b1 bonus to Jump and Swim.

Minor Anger: This will increase the total number of Rages you can use by 1. However, these additional Rages will only take effect after the wielder rests.

Minor Spell Penetration VII: Your Level 7 and lower spells gain +1 to the die roll to penetrate the target's Spell Resistance.
Minor Turning: Increases total number of Turn Undead uses by 1, once wielder rests. If you unequip the item you will lose these turns.
Mirror Shield: This highly polished shield has highly reflective qualities. While actively blocking, you gain +50 Insight bonus to Magical Resistance Rating.
Mithral: Mithral armor is one type lighter then normal. Arcane Spell Failure decreased by 10%. Maximum dexterity bonus increased by 2. Armor check penalty reduced by 3.
Mortal Strike: On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this weapon triggers the Slay Living spell and attempts to instantly snuff out the life force of the enemy (DC 17).
Mother Night's Embrace: This weapon is unholy and imbued by one of the two deities of Barovia - the Mother Night. This weapon is evil, dealing an additional 3d6 evil damage on hit.
Monstrous Humanoid Bane 2: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt those who are descended from monsters dealing an additional 2d10 bane damage vs. Monstrous Humanoids.

Negative Blast 6: This weapon is an unholy conduit, dealing 6d6 Negative damage on a successful hit, and an additional 6d6 Negative damage on a critical hit.
Negative Energy Absorption: This effect absorbs negative energy and energy drain effects.
Negative Energy Spike: This weapon is pulsating with negative energy. It deals an extra 2 to 12 points of negative energy damage on a successful hit.
Negativity 4: This effect causes this weapon to be shrouded in dark mists, dealing 4d6 negative energy on each hit.
Negativity 6: This effect causes this weapon to be shrouded in dark mists, dealing 6d6 negative energy on each hit.

Nightmare Guard: This item has a chance to terrorizing foes that hit you, applying a Mind Thrust effect, when you are hit by them (dealing 5d8 force damage, Will save vs. Enchantments negates). It may also expose your foes to their greatest fears, acting as a Phantasmal Killer spell.

Nightmares: This weapon terrorizes your foes, applying a Mind Thrust effect on successful hits (dealing 5 to 40 force damage, Will vs. Enchantments negates) and exposing your foes to their greatest fears on vorpal hits, acting as a Phantasmal Killer spell.

Nightshade Venom: Any creature struck by this weapon must succeed on a Difficulty Check 22 Fortitude save or fall unconscious. The target may attempt a new save to end the effect every several seconds; otherwise the sleep lasts for 20 seconds.
Nightsinger: 5% Chance On Sonic Spell Hit: Target is Blinded for 6 Seconds
Ninja Spy: This item in one of two pieces of the Ninja Spy set. When both items are equipped you will receive a +2 to hit and +5 additional sneak attack damage, and receive 20% less threat.
Noxious Venom Spike: On Damage: Do an additional 1 to 6 Poison damage.
%b1 Nullification %v1: %v1 %b1 bonus to Negative and Poison spell power.

Nullmagic Guard: On being hit with a spell: There is a small chance that you explode in arcane energies. Foes hit are subject to a silencing effect, preventing their spellcasts and dampening their magical protections for 10 seconds.
Nymph's Healing Empowerment: This soft and soothing magic empowers your ability to heal others. Your Empower Healing metamagic costs 3SP less to use.

Occasional Overcooling: Your shots from this Rune Arm have a 15% chance of freezing your target solid for six seconds. (Fortitude Save negates, DC is equal to your Rune Arm shots, +2 per Charge Tier the shot was fired at).
Occultation: 20% Enhancement bonus to Decreased threat generated from all damage.
Occult Slayer: This item in one of two pieces of the Occult Slayer set. When both items are equipped you will gain a +2 Exceptional Bonus to Will and Reflex saves, and Spell Resistance 22.
On Critical Hit: 1d4 Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution Damage.

Ooze Bane: A bane weapon excels at attacking one type or subtype of creature. Against Oozes, this weapon's effective enhancement bonus is +2 better than its normal enhancement bonus. It deals an extra 2 to 12 points of damage against the foe.
Ooze Bane 2: This weapon is attuned specifically to disrupt Oozes, dealing an additional 2d10 bane damage vs. Oozes.
Ooze Bane 5: This weapon is attuned specifically to disrupt Oozes, dealing an additional 5d10 bane damage vs. Oozes.
%v1 Orb Bonus: While this orb is equipped and you are actively blocking, you gain a %v1 orb bonus to all saving throws, as well as Acid, Cold, Fire, Electric, and Sonic resistances.

Orlassk's Prison: This shield radiates with the power of the Lord of Stone. A shield bash will turn the target to stone. This effect can trigger once ever 90 seconds. A successful Fortitude save (DC 65) negates this effect.

Orc Bane: A bane weapon excels at attacking one type or subtype of creature. Against Orcs, this weapon's effective enhancement bonus is +2 better than its normal enhancement bonus. It deals an extra 2 to 12 points of damage against the foe.
Overfocus: This item helps you focus your attention, but it makes you somewhat oblivious to your surroundings, causing a -10 penalty to Search and Spot.
Overwhelming Despair: The moon empowers your Necromancy spells - causing them to bring Terror to your enemies. Your offensive Necromancy spells automatically apply Crushing Despair with no save.
Overwhelming Incineration: This weapon stores the power of a raging inferno deep within. Occasionally, this destructive power comes to the surface, devastating enemies with overwhelming fire damage.

Overwhelming Shockwave: This legendary weapon resonates with incredible power. On a Vorpal strike that is confirmed as a critical hit, it releases a Shockwave that does tremendous Sonic damage to all foes. Furthermore, the enemy that the shockwave is released on is Dazed from the force of the blast.

Overwhelming Stealer of Souls: This weapon tears at the very essence of your foes. On any strike, this weapon applies a single stack of Soul Scar, which reduces your target's Will Saves, Armor Class, and Fortification by 1 per stack, max 10. Occasionally, this weapon attempts to rip the life from your foe, as if it were the victim of a Phantasmal Killer spell with a DC of 100 versus Will. Bosses (and enemies with more than 10,000 hit points) are immune to this effect. Killing a monster will consume your soul, adding a stack of Consumed Soul to you. Consumed Souls stack up to 20 times, and linger for 20 seconds. Each one provides a +1 Profane bonus to Damage and Melee Power. If you block or unequip this weapon, the Consumed Souls will be released.

Pale Master: This item in one of two pieces of the Pale Master set. When both items are equipped you gain a 30% bonus to all Negative Energy damage, as if you possessed Greater Nullification IX item. If you also have the Pale Master Core 3 Enhancement, these items will grant a 60% bonus to all Negative Energy damage, as if you possessed an Epic Nullification IX item.
Paragon Cerulean Wave: This powerful magical implement hums in your hands and resonates with icy magic. Spells you cast have a chance of freezing your targets in a block of solid ice. DC: 100
Paragon Evil Guard: When hit or missed in combat, the attacking creature takes 4d8 Evil damage.
Paragon Good Guard: When hit or missed in combat, the attacking creature takes 4d8 Good damage.
Paragon Light Guard: When hit or missed in combat, the attacking creature takes 4d8 Light damage.
Paragon Negative Guard: When hit or missed in combat, the attacking creature takes 4d8 Negative damage.

Any creature struck by this weapon must succeed on a DC 17 Will save or be paralyzed. The target may attempt a new save to end the effect every several seconds; otherwise the paralysis lasts for 1 minute. Certain creatures, such as the Undead and Constructs, cannot be paralyzed.

Path of the Guarding Stone: While wearing this item and in mountain stance, there is a chance you will be protected by a Stoneskin spell when enemies strike you.

Peals of Thunder: This weapon is filled with the power of a storm cloud. Occasionally, this thunderous power is unleashed, applying a lasting effect that deals 2 to 8 sonic damage every two seconds for six seconds. If the effect is reapplied before it wears off, the effect will stack and the duration will reset. The effect can be stacked up to 3 times.
Penalty: If equipped by a Good user, they receive 1 Negative Level for as long as this item is equipped.
Penalty: If equipped by a Lawful user, they receive 1 Negative Level for as long as this item is equipped.

Percussive Maintenance 3: Each strike from this weapon vibrates with disruptive levels of energy, interrupting your target's concentration. This weapon's strikes deal 3 Wisdom damage on each hit.

%b1 Proof Against Disease %v1: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a %v1 %b1 bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 3 + their Fortitude save).

Shocking Blast II: This weapon arcs with deadly electricity. The weapon deals an extra 2d6 electric damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 2d6 electric damage.
Shocking Blast III: This weapon arcs with deadly electricity. The weapon deals an extra 3d6 electric damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 3d6 electric damage.

Shocking Blow: This item is charged with electricity. When in melee, on an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit it will punish the target with a large electric shock (10 to 60 electric damage). A successful Reflex save (DC 22) reduces this damage by half.

Silent Moves: This armor is well-oiled and magically constructed, so not only is it nearly silent, it also dampens surrounding sounds. It provides a %v1 Competence bonus on its wearer's Move Silently checks.

Silver, Alchemical: A complex process involving metallurgy and alchemy can bond silver to a weapon made of steel so that it bypasses the damage reduction of creatures such as lycanthropes and vampires.
Silver Flame: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. The cleansing power of the Silver Flame increase the total Hit Dice of undead turned by +6.
Silver Flame Lore %v1: Passive: Your Positive, Light, and Alignment spells gain a %v1 Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
Silver Threaded: A complex process involving metallurgy and alchemy can weave silver into cloth so that it bypasses the protective damage reduction of creatures such as lycanthropes and vampires.

Sky Attunement: While you are a Fire Elemental, you gain bonuses to the caster level (+1 Exceptional), spell power (+10 Exceptional), and critical chance (+2% Exceptional) for your Fire spells.

Skybreaker: On Hit: 3 to 18 Electric damage. On Critical Hit: 10 to 60 additional Sonic damage. On Vorpal Hit: 60-120 additional Electric damage to your target, plus a shockwave that deals an additional 45-90 Sonic damage to all nearby foes.

Slicing: This weapon is incredibly sharp and will do an additional 1 to 4 damage to targets that are vulnerable to bleeding.

Slicing Winds: This weapon stores the cyclonic might of a windstorm within. When this weapon is used, this power can come to the surface as a series of rushing, cutting winds that deal slashing damage to the target over several seconds.

Slowburst: This weapon has an image of a snail worked into its hilt or grip, and it feels cold to the touch. Whenever you score a critical hit with this weapon, the target is slowed for 30 seconds. A DC 15 Will save negates this effect.

Smiting Weapons: While wearing this item, your melee and ranged weapons gain Vorpal Effect: On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this weapon will completely destroy a construct. Powerful constructs may resist the vorpal effect until sufficiently damaged.

Sparkscale: Adds Silver material type. On hit: 15d6 Electric Damage.

Staggering Blow: This item is enchanted to make your attacks send enemies reeling. When you roll a 20 on an attack with a melee weapon you will knock the target down unless it makes a DC 17 Balance check.

Static Attraction: This weapon attracts the static electricity in the air, and over time will charge with magic while held in your main hand. Every five seconds, this weapon gains a charge of Static Electricity, up to a maxiumum of 3, providing a +10 Exceptional bonus to Electric Spell Power and a +5% Exceptional bonus to Electric Spell Lore. When you cast an Electric spell, all stacks are consumed.
Strength Sapping: Every time this weapon deals damage, the target must succeed on a Fortitude save (DC 15) or become exhausted.
Strength Skills - Exceptional Bonus %v1: Passive %v1 Exceptional bonus to the Strength based skills of: Jump and Swim
%b1 Sonic Lore %v1: Passive: Your Sonic spells gain a %v1 %b1 bonus to their chance to critical hit.

%b1 Stunning %v1: %v1 %b1 bonus to the DC of character's Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist attempts.

Sound and Silence: When true power is spoken, weaker beings cannot refute it. Your offensive spells and attacks have a small chance to cause 10d20 Sonic Damage to nearby enemies and Silence them. Each target can negate the Silence on Will save vs DC 90.
Sounding: On Harmful Spellcast: Do an additional 4 to 24 Sonic Damage.
Soundproof: Protects against stunning, dazing and disorientation from sound-based spells such as Soundburst and Greater Shout.
Sovereign Acid Resistance: This property absorbs the first 50 points of Acid damage per attack that the wearer would normally take.

Sovereign Lightning Resistance: This property absorbs the first 50 points of Electric damage per attack that the wearer would normally take.

Sovereign Lightning Strike: This item crackles with power, flickers of lightning emanating from it. On a strike of a Natural 20 that is confirmed as a critical hit, this item will strike your foe with a tremendous burst of lightning. A DC 100 Reflex save will prevent half of this damage.

Sovereign Nightmares: On Vorpal Hit: If your target has below 5,000 Hit Points, a burst of pure terror emanates from this weapon, snuffing out its life as if it were the subject of a Phantasmal Killer spell. If your target has above 5,000 Hit Points, they instead take significant Force damage.

Sovereign Smiting: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Constructs. On Vorpal Hit: If a construct struck by this weapon has fewer than 3000 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the construct has above 3000 Hit Points, it takes 300 damage.
Vorpal: Passive: +0.5[W] damage dice. On a Vorpal Strike: If your target has fewer than 3000 hit points, it is instantly slain. If your target has above 3000 hit points, it takes 300 damage.

Soul Eating: On a Vorpal strike, the dark energy that inhabits this weapon will tear at the soul of your foe, inflicting up to three negative levels to your target. The Soul Eating weapon will feed this stolen life back to you in the form of 35 Temporary Hit Points that last for one minute or until depleted by incoming damage.
Soul of the Elements: While you are centered, this item grants you a bonus depending on your current Monk stance.
Soul Tear: This weapon tears at the soul of your foes, reducing their PRR and Healing Amplification.
Spearblock II: Passive: Reduces physical damage taken by 4, except from Bludgeoning or Slashing weapons. (Damage Reduction: 4/Slash, Bludgeon)

Spearblock VII: Passive: Reduces physical damage taken by 14, except from Bludgeoning or Slashing weapons. (Damage Reduction: 12/Slash, Bludgeon)
Spearblock VIII: Passive: Reduces physical damage taken by 16, except from Bludgeoning or Slashing weapons. (Damage Reduction: 16/Slash, Bludgeon)
Spearblock X: Passive: Reduces physical damage taken by 20, except from Bludgeoning or Slashing weapons. (Damage Reduction: 20/Slash, Bludgeon)

Special: Deals 10 to 60 Negative Energy Damage to nearby enemies, and possibly inflicting a negative level.
